description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Let your child learn their ABC's and 123's while having fun watching things come to life on the screen, with the clouds bringing rain, flowers attracting butterflies and the sun, the airplane and the windmill in motion. Finish off each session with fireworks. Catchy background music and some random sounds should keep your kid entertained for a long time. Learning something was never so much fun!
